name: Art of Dreams
description:
How to play:

Press the space bar to start.

Use arrow keys to walk, hold V to run, press X to use items, up arrow or space to jump.

Might also work with some game pads.

Art of Dreams is many things:

  • A short, simple platformer
  • Made with Kenney game assets
  • Split-screen co-op, if you download a desktop version
  • Sort of an art educational game
  • Open Source
  • Totally not finished, but still pretty playable
  • Missing instructions, a story, sound effects, music and a bunch of other stuff (obviously)
